page.title: 15A VILLAGE MUM'S DAY - 3
page.content: The dog and I enjoy our walk. We need to cross the railway line but first have to let a dirty goods train by. Safely in the field, Shanty runs after the rabbits but never catches them. We arrive home; dog and mistress have a cold drink before the latter gets out the vacuum cleaner. This time I really do buzz round and get some jobs done. It's 1 o'clock and news time - and my lunch break. A piece of cheese and an apple will keep me going a little longer. Some of the vegetable patch gets weeded. I like to work in the garden because it calms me if I'm in a temper (which today I am not). It's nearly 3 o'clock now and time for the girls to come home. I like to stand at the school gate and watch them come out. Today they go to a friend's as I run a Brownie pack on Mondays and clean the school early.
